event.description: Jordy Mercer grounds out, third baseman Josh Donaldson to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Starling Marte grounds out softly, shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Andrew McCutchen strikes out swinging.
David Freese walks.
Jose Osuna strikes out swinging.
Josh Harrison grounds into a double play, shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to second baseman Ryan Goins to first baseman Kendrys Morales. David Freese out at 2nd.
Josh Bell grounds out, pitcher Francisco Liriano to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Phil Gosselin singles on a ground ball to right fielder Melvin Upton.
Elias Diaz flies out to right fielder Melvin Upton.
Jordy Mercer singles on a soft ground ball to third baseman Josh Donaldson. Phil Gosselin advances to 3rd, on a throwing error by third baseman Josh Donaldson.
With Starling Marte batting, wild pitch by Francisco Liriano, Jordy Mercer to 2nd.
Starling Marte grounds out, shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to first baseman Kendrys Morales.
Defensive Substitution: Ezequiel Carrera replaces center fielder Kevin Pillar, batting 1st, playing center field.
Darwin Barney remains in the game as the third baseman.
Gregorio Petit remains in the game as the shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Justin Smoak replaces shortstop Troy Tulowitzki, batting 4th, playing first base.
Andrew McCutchen walks.
David Freese strikes out on a foul tip.
Jose Osuna strikes out swinging.
Josh Harrison hit by pitch. Andrew McCutchen to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Mike Bolsinger replaces Francisco Liriano.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Erich Weiss replaces Josh Harrison.
Josh Bell singles on a line drive to right fielder Melvin Upton. Andrew McCutchen scores. Erich Weiss to 3rd.
Phil Gosselin strikes out swinging.
Defensive switch from center field to left field for Ezequiel Carrera.
Defensive Substitution: Jonathan Davis replaces left fielder Steve Pearce, batting 6th, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Ian Parmley replaces right fielder Melvin Upton, batting 8th, playing right field.
Elias Diaz doubles (3) on a line drive to center fielder Jonathan Davis.
Cole Tucker doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Ezequiel Carrera. Elias Diaz to 3rd.
Adam Frazier singles on a line drive to center fielder Jonathan Davis. Elias Diaz scores. Cole Tucker to 3rd.
With John Jaso batting, wild pitch by Mike Bolsinger, Adam Frazier to 2nd.
John Jaso walks. Wild pitch by pitcher Mike Bolsinger. Cole Tucker scores. Adam Frazier to 3rd.
Eric Wood singles on a line drive to right fielder Ian Parmley. Adam Frazier scores. John Jaso to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Tim Mayza replaces Mike Bolsinger.
Jose Osuna flies out to center fielder Jonathan Davis. John Jaso to 3rd.
Erich Weiss reaches on a fielder's choice out, first baseman Justin Smoak to catcher Jarrod Saltalamacchia. John Jaso out at home. Eric Wood to 2nd.
With Alen Hanson batting, wild pitch by Tim Mayza, Eric Wood to 3rd. Erich Weiss to 2nd.
Alen Hanson strikes out swinging.
Defensive switch from third base to second base for Darwin Barney.
Rowdy Tellez remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Defensive Substitution: Mike Ohlman replaces catcher Jarrod Saltalamacchia, batting 7th, playing catcher.
Defensive Substitution: Jake Elmore replaces second baseman Ryan Goins, batting 9th, playing third base.
Pitching Change: John Stilson replaces Tim Mayza.
Connor Joe grounds out, second baseman Darwin Barney to first baseman Justin Smoak.
Jacob Stallings flies out to center fielder Jonathan Davis.
Cole Tucker strikes out swinging.
Christian Lopes remains in the game as the second baseman.
Defensive Substitution: Shane Opitz replaces first baseman Justin Smoak, batting 4th, playing first base.
Pitching Change: Alonzo Gonzalez replaces John Stilson.
Defensive Substitution: Dwight Smith replaces left fielder Ezequiel Carrera, batting 1st, playing left field.
Austin Meadows flies out to left fielder Dwight Smith.
Jordan Luplow strikes out swinging.
Eric Wood lines out sharply to left fielder Dwight Smith.
Pitching Change: Dusty Isaacs replaces Alonzo Gonzalez.
Defensive Substitution: Mike Reeves replaces catcher Mike Ohlman, batting 7th, playing catcher.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Michael Suchy replaces Jose Osuna.
Michael Suchy strikes out swinging.
Erich Weiss singles on a line drive to right fielder Ian Parmley.
Alen Hanson flies out to left fielder Dwight Smith.
Connor Joe grounds out sharply to first baseman Shane Opitz.
Defensive switch from first base to third base for Shane Opitz.
Rowdy Tellez remains in the game as the first baseman.
Pitching Change: Justin Shafer replaces Dusty Isaacs, batting 9th.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Chris Diaz replaces Jacob Stallings.
Chris Diaz walks.
Cole Tucker pops out to shortstop Gregorio Petit.
Austin Meadows singles on a ground ball to right fielder Ian Parmley. Chris Diaz to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Danny Ortiz replaces Jordan Luplow.
Danny Ortiz strikes out swinging.
With Eric Wood batting, wild pitch by Justin Shafer, Chris Diaz to 3rd. Austin Meadows to 2nd.
Eric Wood strikes out swinging.
Kevin Pillar grounds out, shortstop Jordy Mercer to first baseman Josh Bell.
Josh Donaldson grounds out, first baseman Josh Bell to pitcher Chad Kuhl.
Kendrys Morales flies out to center fielder Starling Marte.
Troy Tulowitzki doubles (4) on a fly ball to right fielder Andrew McCutchen.
Russell Martin hit by pitch.
Steve Pearce singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Phil Gosselin. Troy Tulowitzki to 3rd. Russell Martin to 2nd.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia called out on strikes.
Melvin Upton grounds into a force out, third baseman David Freese to second baseman Josh Harrison. Troy Tulowitzki scores. Russell Martin to 3rd. Steve Pearce out at 2nd. Melvin Upton to 1st.
With Ryan Goins batting, Melvin Upton caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Elias Diaz to shortstop Jordy Mercer.
Ryan Goins grounds out, second baseman Josh Harrison to first baseman Josh Bell.
Kevin Pillar singles on a line drive to right fielder Andrew McCutchen.
Josh Donaldson walks. Kevin Pillar to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Darwin Barney replaces Josh Donaldson.
Kendrys Morales doubles (4) on a fly ball to left fielder Phil Gosselin. Kevin Pillar scores. Darwin Barney to 3rd.
Troy Tulowitzki pops out to catcher Elias Diaz in foul territory.
Russell Martin walks.
Pitching Change: Dan Runzler replaces Chad Kuhl.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Gregorio Petit replaces Kendrys Morales.
Steve Pearce pops out to first baseman Josh Bell in foul territory.
Defensive Substitution: Cole Tucker replaces shortstop Jordy Mercer, batting 1st, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Adam Frazier replaces center fielder Starling Marte, batting 2nd, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: John Jaso replaces right fielder Andrew McCutchen, batting 3rd, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Eric Wood replaces third baseman David Freese, batting 4th, playing third base.
Erich Weiss remains in the game as the second baseman.
Defensive Substitution: Alen Hanson replaces first baseman Josh Bell, batting 7th, playing left field.
Defensive switch from left field to first base for Phil Gosselin.
Pitching Change: Tyler Glasnow replaces Dan Runzler.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia walks.
With Melvin Upton batting, wild pitch by Tyler Glasnow, Jarrod Saltalamacchia to 2nd.
Melvin Upton homers (3) on a fly ball to left center field. Jarrod Saltalamacchia scores.
Ryan Goins called out on strikes.
Ezequiel Carrera doubles (3) on a fly ball to right fielder John Jaso.
Darwin Barney strikes out swinging.
Gregorio Petit grounds out, third baseman Eric Wood to first baseman Phil Gosselin.
Defensive Substitution: Austin Meadows replaces center fielder Adam Frazier, batting 2nd, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Connor Joe replaces first baseman Phil Gosselin, batting 8th, playing right field.
Defensive switch from third base to first base for Eric Wood.
Defensive switch from left field to third base for Alen Hanson.
Defensive Substitution: Jordan Luplow replaces right fielder John Jaso, batting 3rd, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Jacob Stallings replaces catcher Elias Diaz, batting 9th, playing catcher.
Justin Smoak singles on a line drive to center fielder Austin Meadows.
Russell Martin singles on a ground ball to right fielder Connor Joe. Justin Smoak to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Rowdy Tellez replaces Russell Martin.
Jonathan Davis strikes out swinging.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia called out on strikes.
Ian Parmley lines out to center fielder Austin Meadows.
Jake Elmore doubles (4) on a line drive to left fielder Jordan Luplow.
With Ezequiel Carrera batting, Jake Elmore steals (3) 3rd base.
Ezequiel Carrera flies out to center fielder Austin Meadows.
Darwin Barney singles on a ground ball to center fielder Austin Meadows. Jake Elmore scores.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Christian Lopes replaces Darwin Barney.
Gregorio Petit strikes out swinging. Wild pitch by pitcher Tyler Glasnow. Christian Lopes to 2nd.
Justin Smoak lines out sharply to third baseman Alen Hanson.
Pitching Change: Montana DuRapau replaces Tyler Glasnow.
Rowdy Tellez homers (1) on a fly ball to center field.
Jonathan Davis strikes out swinging.
Mike Ohlman called out on strikes.
Ian Parmley strikes out swinging.
Michael Suchy remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitching Change: John Kuchno replaces Montana DuRapau.
Jake Elmore strikes out swinging.
Dwight Smith grounds out, first baseman Eric Wood to second baseman Erich Weiss to pitcher John Kuchno.
Christian Lopes singles on a ground ball to center fielder Austin Meadows.
Gregorio Petit grounds out, third baseman Alen Hanson to first baseman Eric Wood.
